tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I cannot express enough how grateful I am for the incredible care that my wife received from Dr. Thejaswini. From the very first visit to the last, Dr. Thejaswini has been an absolute godsend. Her dedication to her patients and her unwavering commitment to their well-being is truly remarkable.

First and foremost, Dr. Thejaswini's warm and compassionate demeanor immediately puts patients at ease. She takes the time to listen attentively, addressing all concerns and questions with patience and empathy. This level of genuine care goes a long way in reducing the anxiety that often accompanies visits to a gynecologist.

What sets Dr. Thejaswini apart is her exceptional ability to educate and empower her patients. She took the time to explain every aspect of my wife's treatment, making sure we fully understood the options and decisions ahead. This transparency was invaluable in helping us make informed choices regarding our healthcare.

One of Dr. Thejaswini's most remarkable qualities is her conscientious approach to medical care. She firmly believes in not prescribing unnecessary medicines or tests. She said "You don't need a doctor; you need a dietician first," embodies her commitment to addressing the root causes of health issues rather than relying solely on medications. This approach demonstrates her dedication to the long-term health and well-being of her patients.

Thank you, Dr. Thejaswini, for being the incredible doctor that you are, and for making such a positive impact on our lives. 

Regards,
Niyati and Ashwani

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Was fortunate enough to find her. What a gem of person and professional ma‚Äôam is. 

She was consulting doctor through my wife‚Äôs pregnancy and there was no one better I could‚Äôve wished for. Now I will tell my reason in the most layman‚Äôs perspective 

1. Very grounded in her approach and would only make the necessary recommendation in terms of medicines or scans, so one can be assured if Dr has prescribed it then it is of utmost importance and not for the pharmacy or the scan clinics profits as sometimes people are apprehensive about.

2. Listens and encourages you throughout your journey, without you ever feeling if she is rushing into things

3. Approachable for people from all kinds of economic strata in the society.

4. Will never hint at or even make a passing reference of C Section unless absolutely necessary, will encourage you and give your tips for natural delivery right from day 1.

5. She helped us naturally deliver a healthy baby boy in Columbia Asia Sarjapur after my wife went in labour 24 hours after her water broke. She insisted on not going the c section route or even giving epidurals as she said that the vitals are all good and natural route is best one at this stage even when my wife said that the pain was unbearable, she held her hand and encouraged her to be the most comfortable position to push, which the nurse weren‚Äôt allowing (squat position). 

Thanks you Dr and May you be blessed with all the good health and fortune.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with Dr Thejaswini was not good . Doctor is good in her experience & work . I had a normal delivery through induction . Whenever I visited her for my check-ups she only spoke to the point my consultation did not last for more than 15mins throughout my visits . No friendly conversation nothing on a personal level . As I was a first time mother & new to motherhood no proper guidance or help. On suggesting that we will need her phone number at some time as I was nearing delivery she gave us a blunt reply & indirectly mentioned that she is not interested in giving her number which is anyway acceptable as they are doctors and receive lot of calls but the way she spoke to us was not courteous. Postpartum she did not recommend me to take my regular supplements ***** * ****** **** ***** * ** ************* * ** *** ** *** ******** *** *** ** *** * ** ******* **** *** ***** * *** ****** **** *** ******** ** *** * ** ** **** ** ** **** **** *** *** ********* ******* *** *** ***** * She only keeps herself to her work & is not interested in a friendly conversation with the patient

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review: I had a very good experience with Dr Thejaswini and would highly recommend her to patients. She is such a wonderful person and a very good doctor. I visited her for my Maternity check up & Pregnancy consultations. The way she explained and handled my all check up was really appreciable. She has been extremely professional, polite, humble, kind, and took extreme care of me through the whole pregnancy. She was calm and confident through out my all visits till delivery. She mentioned that she just wanted to give us a healthy baby, and my husband and I are grateful for the beautiful little healthy baby boy we have now. She encouraged for normal delivery and we were blessed to get the baby delivered by her at OT. I will highly recommend her for all the patients. Thanks you so much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went to Dr. Thejaswini on the very first day when I got to know that I am pregnant.From Day 1 to post delivery I was on regular check up with her.I  can't express my feelings that much she had supported me mentally..I had too much nausea because of which I had lots of issues.But thejaswini mam treated all the situations very nicely.Her explanations on each n everything is really amazing.she is not prescribing unnecessary medicines or tests.whatever is required she will only suggest to do. She is so friendly.I  was so scared because it was my 1st pregnancy but she really supported and helped me a lot in every manner. During labour also she has waited quite long for my delivery to make it normal and she did that.I heartly thank mam for everything. She means a lot to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited the doctor since the beginning of my pregnancy after reading reviews on practo. She made me n my husband so comfortable throughout the 9 months journey. *** ***** ********** *** *********** *********** ** ****** Post my 1st trimester she always insisted to do prenatal exercises and stay active to have a smooth delivery and reduced body pains n discomfort. I always wanted a normal delivery and she ensured that till the end.  I delivered a healthy baby girl in August '21 through normal delivery. She explains and discusses every concern in detail. Having a doctor whom I can rely on was so comforting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was trying for pregnancy since 3 years , with sometime no success and 2 miscarriages. I was dealing with so much depression that whether I will ever conceive , then I came across Dr Thejaswini through practo. A Dr I have never seen before. She is very friendly and used to give treatment and suggestions which are actually required and not unnecessary treatment and suggestions. It was during covid time 2020 , she suggested of IUI and I successfully conceived in 2nd attempt. Throughout my journey of pregnancy she answered all questions and doubts of my husband very well . And finally we were blessed with baby girl in March. We were so lucky to find a Dr like her. Thank you Maam for giving precious gift to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Tejaswini is my  gynac.all through my phase of pregnancy she made me feel confident and happy.intially I had problem in pregnancy. I was given proper treatment and confidence to save my pregnancy. Finally doctor made a safe delivery .I thank my Dr.Tejaswini for giving me confidence and assisting me all through my pregnancy and my delivery. Dr.Tejaswini has lot of patience ,understands patients anxiety and gives proper suggestion.Dr.Tejaswini does real service truly from her heart.god bless doctor.i am so lucky to have Dr.tejaswini as my doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I got Dr Thejaswini's reference from one of my friends and I had a very good experience with her. She is very calm and patient and her experience shows in her consultations. She always boosted my confidence about normal delivery. She won't prescribe any unnecessary medications. 
In later months inspite of having complications she dint let me lose hope. She has always been very supportive and very much approachable. She handled my pregnancy very well, avoided c-sec and I delivered a healthy baby through assisted vaginal delivery 6 months ago. I am very much thankful to Dr Thejaswini's and would recommend her very strongly.

I believe & i ll recommend strongly ...

Dr. Tejaswini was a fantastic blessing we had during our journey right until delivery. I have referred a few of my friends as well based on our experience and they have all been happy. You need to trust her and have faith in the almighty. All the best to Dr. Tejaswini and the cunsulting patients. Thank you.

Dr. Thejaswini J.,
There are not enough words to describe how thankful we are for you loving and compassionate care throughout my both the pregnancies and deliveries. Four years back when I met you first time, your professionalism, friendliness and that great smile made me feel that I found the best doctor. You helped us bring two perfect miracles in our lives and we couldn‚Äôt be more grateful. Thank you!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had my normal delivery on 28th June 2020 morning 3.40 am . Dr tejeshwini is very friendly and very professional. in that covid situation , she made sure that she ans me for every question . I admitted to hospital at 27th jun 11pm   and dr made sure to call staff every half an hour for an update and around 2 am she was at hospital . and the delivery was smooth . we owe you for a stress less pregnancy journey .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: First of all Thanks to Dr Tejaswini.We were blessed with a baby boy on 28 th march 22 and the weight of the baby is 3.5 kg.Madam had suggested the test according to her experience which was perfect and whenever we visited her she used to give the Positive hopes as well as she used to give some true facts also which not everyone likes but yes we accepted and we did those procedures. When we did the HSG test which doctor had suspected that my wife had those blockages in her tubes but one major thing is that madam missed some prerequisites before coming for the test. she speaks very less that was one disadvantage for me. She kept waiting for their patients for a long time like 1 hour from the scheduled time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It all started when I went to visit Tejaswini mam when I was 13 weeks pregnant. My pregnancy was a high risk one and the way ma'am had helped me throughout the pregnancy is beyond any words.
I had multiple complication throughout the pregnancy and madam had handled the issues seamlessly and always gave me courage.
She is extremely knowledgeable and humble and listens to patience issues. I had received offline support from her as well and the reason to day I had my baby via normal delivery is because madam had handled my pregnancy.

Thank you so much Ma'am , i cannot ever thank you enough.

-sanghamitra and shubhadeep

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I met Dr Thejaswini J from very first day of my pregnancy and I don't have enough words to describe her. I remember the day 1 when I was anxious about my pregnancy, yours words made my whole journey special and smooth. She patiently listens to all the doubts, very humble and polite and from the beginning she encouraged me for normal delivery and till last she tried and gave all her time and efforts to make it happen but at last I had to go through emergency c-section. I respect her decision and lots of love to you mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Labor and Delivery,Prenatal Checkup,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Check Up,
review: Mam is a gem of a person. My wife had suffered 2 miscarriages earlier and we have almost lost the hope. Then one of my colleague suggested to meet Thejaswini mam. We were very much impressed and confident after meeting her. She guided so well for normal conception and yes that worked. During the entire pregnancy she supported my wife with all the proper medications and did not take any risks. Even at the time if delivery, she guided so well. My wife had complications post delivery around midnight and doctor turned up in few minutes to control the situation. She continuosly monitored her for 48 hours and did all her best to control any further complication. We are now blessed with a baby. I would definitely recommend her. She is very polite and really very caring. Thank you so much mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The first time we went to her was for a second opinion as the pregnancy was not progressing well. Unfortunately, we had to undergo a termination but Dr. Thejaswini was completely understanding and sensitive towards the situation, specially as she made me feel guilt free of the mishap.
She is quite friendly and approachable. It was appreciable how she promptly responds over phone and messages and ensures the problem, cause and remedy is well explained.
An year later, we consulted her as I had conceived and understably we were worried but she instilled hope and guided us through the pregnancy smoothly and thanks to her we were blessed with a baby boy with a normal delivery recently :)
